12.text: A word meaning eligible or deserving.

16.text:

I didn't see.

using my gifts and talents to build my life

of my accomplishments and what I could achieve.

44.text:

Thinking that while I was on earth I would

65.text:

I was in a place of desperation trying to
plea

My life with all it’s earthly pursuits,

I realized my choices didn’t bring me life
I put my identity in things that only brought

97.text:
I sought out contentment in the things of

100.text:

111.text:
realizing it wasn't about me or the life that
I live,

117.text: See I was entitled, I was deserving.

120.text:
But what I was eligible for, was that I should
be burning.

123.text:
Separated from Him who I would daily forsake,
all for the purpose of making my name great.

129.text:
But see that’s why Christ stepped in, with
unconditional love,

133.text:
two thousand years ago coming from His heaven
above.

135.text:
Humbling himself in this world so He could

139.text:
putting to death all my sins, because of His

143.text:
So that by His payment through death and resurrection,
I am now viewed by the Father as having perfection.

153.text: He took the fall for my capital offense.

157.text:
So now I am entitled, but not by my doing,
but because He wanted to save me and give

163.text:
See I was already dead in my trespasses and

166.text:

169.text:
That’s why it’s not about me, or my talents

172.text:
He gave me those things so I could use them

175.text: the focus on Him and what this life is about.

179.text: Pointing others to the only saving route.

181.text:
By trusting in His undeserving provision,
not by our works, but by our decision.

187.text:
In the Bible, James refers to our lives as

190.text:
It’s such a short period of time that we
even exist.

193.text:
So why make it about us and our life that
is rotten?

196.text: Just so we can one day die and then be forgotten?

198.text:
But if we have accepted Christ’s gift of
eternal salvation,

201.text:

207.text:

211.text:
There will come a day when it will be too
late,

213.text:
that’s why it’s so important we do something

216.text:
In Mark sixteen verse fifteen, Jesus tells
us to go

219.text: out into the world so that others will know.

So you can do it the way I did for a most

225.text:

227.text:

231.text:

241.text:
So I beg that you would take these words to

247.text:
